name: Spinning Around
description: Are you up for the challenge? Spinning around is an arcade game that will test your reflexes in the simplest form. Guide your spaceship through the gates,be fast!
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 55 MB available space
